channel.title: Broken Player Rights On A Command

item.title: Broken Player Rights On A Command
item.dc:creator: @StrikeScape StrikeScape
item.description:
@StrikeScape wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pkoff") && playerRights >= 2) { try { if(wildyoff == 0) { wildyoff = 1; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Pk mode is now off WOOT YOURE SAFE NOW!"; } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Pk mode is already turned off"); } } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pkon") && playerRights >= 2) { try { if(wildyoff == 1) { wildyoff = 0; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Pk mode is now on RUN FOR YOUR LIVES!"; } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Pk mode is already turned on"); } }

item.title: Broken Player Rights On A Command
item.dc:creator: @buzzman1992 buzzman1992
item.description:
@buzzman1992 wrote:

Well When I Compile This Isnt Working Due To The Player Rights Not Working…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pkoff")) && playerRights >= 2;
			{
	try {
	    if(wildyoff == 0); {
		wildyoff = 1;
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Pk mode is now off WOOT YOURE SAFE NOW!";
	    }
	} catch(Exception e) {
	    sendMessage("Pk mode is already turned off");
	}
    }
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pkon")) && playerRights >= 2;
			{
	try {
	    if(wildyoff == 1); {
		wildyoff = 0;
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Pk mode is now on RUN FOR YOUR LIVES!";
	    }
	} catch(Exception e) {
	    sendMessage("Pk mode is already turned on");
	}
    }

Read full topic
